description: If you’re feeling the need for speed, the Interceptr™ 1/4 Zip puts the pedal to the metal. Kuhl's hybrid design features Alfpaca Gold™ performance fleece at the front and back for core warmth and comfort. Exclusive Kashmira™ side panels reduce bulk and increase breathability. Layered up or standing alone, the Interceptr is built for life in the passing lane.
name: Kuhl Interceptr 1/4 Zip - Mens
